Text:
I don't really know what to think of this book: one the one hand, a lot of the information they give seems reliable, but on the other, they buy into fads that have been disproven with cold hard facts, like the notion that buying 'organic' and locally-grown is better. Take this book with a grain of salt.

PDF quality is good, completely searchable (no scanned images, but text).
Razuhimin...Thats because it is better to buy organic and locally grown for obvious reasons you non-contributing zero...some foods yeah minimal difference organic to non-organic but still better
